name: moveless
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not moving: A thick fog spread white and moveless over the whole town. She sat moveless, staring out of the window.
More examplesFewer examplesThe track to the village could be dangerous in this moveless white snow.As he stood silently behind the chair, I never saw a figure so moveless.A deer stood moveless and unblinking in the clearing.He lay there moveless, his skin like pale marble.The city sat silent and moveless as dawn broke.
